Plot: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.
Title: American Reunion
Writer: Jon Hurwitz (screenplay), Hayden Schlossberg (screenplay), Adam Herz (characters)
Actors: Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Chris Klein, Thomas Ian Nicholas
tomatoConsensus: It'll provide sweetly nostalgic comfort food for fans of the franchise, but American Reunion fails to do anything truly new or interesting -- or even very funny -- with the characters.
